SageTVPlugin.Name: Recently Watched
SageTVPlugin.Description: Recently Watched for SageTV 7. Keep track of what shows you have recently watched.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.4: - Fixed bug that caused the wrong watched time to be displayed. - Fixed incompatibility with PlayON Plugin.
Version 1.3. Fixed bug that caused Online Videos to fail.
Version 1.2. Fixed dependency on sagex API.
